long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A super simple tool for M1 Finance that changes the colors of the gains. 

Currently, positive gains are black, negative losses at green.

This is meant as a tool to help psychologically see deals when prices drop, instead of treating them as losses.

If there is interest, we will build out this tool.
